plugin.description: Renames automatically each subclass of a class
config.phasetimeout.name: Rename timeout
config.phasetimeout.description: Time in seconds after which the renaming is cancelled
config.nodebug.name: No debug
ui.pane.namepattern.name: Name pattern
ui.pane.namepattern.description:
Pattern to rename the subclasses
Use %s for the original name, %s for the index of the subclass
ui.pane.recursive.name: Rename subclasses recursively
